page.title: 01Landscape ,Gipsey Bridge
page.content: The area around us is mostly arable land, it is a mixture of large and small farms.Most farmers keep a few cows or sheep too.At the west side of our area is the small village of Gipsey Bridge and on the eastern edge is the slightly larger village of Frithville.The area is drained fen land and there are many drains the largest of which is the West Fen Drain in Frithville. The houses are scattered all across the square with a small school and a Post Office in each village.There is an agricultural engineer, Crawford's at Frithville which supplies tractors ,harvesters etc. The main centre for shopping, business and entertainment is Boston which is approx.5 miles away.
